body: GARGADI UBA: Za a dakatar da asusunka cikin sa'o'i 24. Tabbatar da asusunka yanzu a http://uba-secure-check.com don gujewa rufewa.
Taya murna! Kana da cancanci samun dawowar haraji na musamman. Danna wannan mahaɗin don karɓa cikin awanni 12: https://bit.ly/rebatesafrica
Abokin ciniki, za a kashe SIM ɗinka yau. Tabbatar da NIN ɗinka yanzu ta http://mtn-verify.ng kuma shigar da OTP ɗinka.
